Watch: Bottas breaks lap record at COTA to qualify on pole for US Grand Prix
03 Nov 2019, 13:50 by Matt Gretton

Valtteri Bottas posted a sublime lap time in the opening round of Q3, so good that it broke the lap record at COTA. Mercedes have posted the lap on their twitter, with the on-board camera.
